'''John Justinian de Ledesma''' ([[24 November|November 24]], [[1917]] - [[29 November|November 29]], [[2002]]) was an English stage actor of Argentine descent. After breaking through in ''[[wikipedia:The Thief of Bagdad (1940 film)|The Thief of Bagdad]]'' in [[1940]], he joined the Royal Air Force, and after the war, he continued stage acting. He made some appearances on radio and television; one of those was the role of [[Thorin]] in [[The Hobbit (1968 radio series)|''The Hobbit'' (1968 radio series)]].
